original_title: こ じ 開 け ら れ た 陰唇 巨乳 妻 隣人 凌辱 の 悲劇 佐 山 愛
overview: A couple who moved from a company house to an apartment with a wish come true. The man who lives next door to his new home is Kogure, a man who has had a distorted complex about women since he was a boy. It didn't take long for Kogure's depressed desires to be ignited by the presence of a beautiful big-breasted wife who became his next-door neighbor.
title: Shame Brought To Light Big Tits Neighbor’s Wife Torture & Rape Tragedy Ai Sayama
